desc.en: Get ready to see the world's best gamers at the IEM Katowice in Starcraft 2 from the Spodek Arena. This is the quaterfinal.

ESL One will be hosting Poland's first ever DOTA 2 Major: Sixteen teams from across the globe will fight for a part of the $1,000,000 USD prize pool and 1,500 qualifying points for The International 2018. The playoffs will be held on February 24-25, 2018 at the Spodek Arena in Katowice, Poland. Get ready for the groupstages.

The playoffs will be held on February 24-25, 2018 at the Spodek Arena in Katowice, Poland. Get ready for the groupstages.

title.en: Street Fighter V: ESL One New York 2017

desc.en: Spodek Arena in Poland was the host of the HGC Katowice 2016, Heroes of the Storm. Only the best players from around the world is good enough to compete in Katowice. The event was not only featuring a 100.000 US dollars prize pool, but also gave the winner the chance to grab the spot in the Heroes Spring Global Championship with a prize pot of 500.000 US dollars.

title.en: Heroes of the Storm: HGC Katowice 2016

desc.en: North America Spring Regional Championship took place at ESL Studio, Burbank in California. Top 2 will qualify for the 2016 Heroes of the Storm Spring Global Championship, and the winning team will skip the first group stage there. See the teams compete in NA Spring Regional Championship for the prize pool of 1.000.000 dollars. This game is between Team Mom and Cognitive Gaming.

title.en: Heroes of the Storm: HGC NA Spring Regional

desc.en: North America Spring Regional Championship took place at ESL Studio, Burbank in California. Top 2 will qualify for the 2016 Heroes of the Storm Spring Global Championship, and the winning team will skip the first group stage there. See the teams compete in NA Spring Regional Championship for the prize pool of 1.000.000 dollars. This game is between Cloud9 and Team Blaze.

title.en: Heroes of the Storm: HGC NA Spring Regional

desc.en: Everyones attention is to South Korea, where League of Legends players from across the globe will head to IEM Gyeonggi from December 16-18, marking the first IEM tournament in the country since Season 3. The event will take place at Goyang Sports Center where eight League of Legends teams will battle for the IEM Gyeonggi championship and a spot at the IEM World Championship in Katowice, Poland in 2017. Two teams from Korea will defend their home ground in the tournament, with representatives from Europe, North America, China, LMS, and two wildcard teams rounding out the lineup. Watch this game from group B: Team Liquid vs. Giants Gaming.
